item.title: BCS
item.description: Faculty of Automatic Control and Computers Polytechnic University of Bucharest one of the most prestigious bachelor’s degree in Romania September 2017 - July 2021 Some of the most important courses were: Parallel and Distributed Algorithms Low level programming (Assembly) Operating Systems Programming Paradigms Database Administration

item.title: Colliers
item.description: January 2020 - Present Contract scrape data from various real estate websites run machine learning algorithms to predict prices based on cluster execute database queries to format and autocomplete data used technologies: Python, MongoDB, Linux, AWS EC2, S3

item.title: Luxoft - Cisco
item.description: May 2020 - January 2021 develop solutions to everyday problems that occur through our cloud based network and add extra features ensure security between the K8s pods - spiffe spire improve the network performance with tools like used technologies: Go, Kubernetes, Docker, Bash, CircleCI/Jenkins, Python in an Agile environment

item.title: Toyota
item.description: June 2019 - September 2019 design storage deposit layout using Kollmorgen suite get used to logistical thinking
